mapper.sql: id, article_title, article_author, article_like_count, visit_count, remark, create_time, update_time, article_type_id

article_title = #{articleTitle},
article_author = #{articleAuthor},
article_like_count = #{articleLikeCount},
visit_count = #{visitCount},
remark = #{remark},
article_type_id = #{articleTypeId},
update_time = #{updateTime}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inside_article (article_title, article_author, article_like_count, visit_count, article_content, remark, create_time, article_type_id) VALUES (#{articleTitle}, #{articleAuthor}, #{articleLikeCount}, #{visitCount}, #{articleContent}, #{remark}, #{createTime}, #{articleTypeId});
mapper.update: UPDATE inside_article SET article_title=#{articleTitle}, article_author=#{articleAuthor}, article_type_id = #{articleTypeId}, update_time=NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE inside_article SET article_content=#{articleContent}, update_time=NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE inside_article SET visit_count=visit_count+1, update_time=NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
